nodes.text: Masters of Teräs Käsi: Prima's Official Hints and Tips
Masters of Teräs Käsi: Prima's Official Hints and Tips is a video game strategy guide written by Anthony James and published by Prima Games in March 1998.
Master the deadly art of Teräs Käsi!
From the icy terrain of Hoth to the sand dunes of Tatooine, battles are being waged by the likes of Luke Skywalker and Darth Vader.
With this guide, defeat Arden Lyn and discover:
